name: Puffin Academy
description: Puffin Academy is a wicked fast Mobile Flash Browser for K-12 students, teachers, and parents.  Puffin Academy Key Features:  Free to all users and content providers - Free app to all users on Android devices - Free of charge to all educational content providers  For purely educational web sites only - Educational content providers must apply for approval - Once approved, contents are available to all users  Incredible speed and Flash support - A faster browsing experience - Supports Flash contents & videos on Android devices  Questions & Answers:  Q: Whats the business model? - A: None! Its a community feedback project.  Q: How long will it last? - A: Forever! As long as there is a need.  Q: Why to launch Puffin Academy? - A: Destiny! Its why CloudMosa was founded.
